Title: WPF Guidance for Claims-Based and Federated Security Models
Description: This project includes a whitepaper, code samples that are reference implementations providing guidance for building claims-based and federated security models that involve WPF clients with WCF and Geneva Framework. Note that Geneva Framework is not required for the WPF client.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This project includes a whitepaper, code samples that are reference implementations providing guidance for building claims-based and federated security models that involve WPF clients with WCF and Geneva Framework. Note that Geneva Framework is not required for the WPF client.


Latest Release
The latest release of the reference samples an be found here: Sample Code
UPDATED Nov 22, 2009 for the release of Windows Identity Foundation

The accompanying whitepaper can be found here: Building Claims-Based WPF Applications Whitepaper

Contact Info
Please try to use the discussion board for this project for any project-related questions and feedback. If you have a question not project-related you can email me, Michele Leroux Bustamante, at mlb@dasblonde.net
